verbs.description: A Muslim civil rights group [V: is] blasting President Donald Trump and his administration , saying his words and policies led to a sharp increase in attacks and bias against American Muslims in 2017 .

[ARG0: A Muslim civil rights group] is [V: blasting] [ARG1: President Donald Trump and his administration] , [ARGM-PRD: saying his words and policies led to a sharp increase in attacks and bias against American Muslims in 2017] .

[ARG0: A Muslim civil rights group] is blasting President Donald Trump and his administration , [V: saying] [ARG1: his words and policies led to a sharp increase in attacks and bias against American Muslims in 2017] .

A Muslim civil rights group is blasting President Donald Trump and his administration , saying [ARG0: his words and policies] [V: led] [ARG2: to a sharp increase in attacks and bias against American Muslims in 2017] .
